    Method that sets up the labels of the products ComboBox
    void
    createAddButtonActionListener(JButton addOrderBtn)
    Method that creates the action listener of the button that creates a new order This method calls a method of productBLL that checks whether the order can be placed (if the amount of products that the client wants order are in stock) If the order can be placed, a new order is created and the stock of products is updated, otherwise a warning understock messages is displayed
    void
    createBackButtonActionListener(JButton backButton)
    Method that creates an action listener for the button that takes the user back to the main window of the application
    void
    createBillButtonActionListener(JButton billButton)
    Method that creates an action listener for the button that generates the bill of given order The order whose bill is generated is selected by ID
    void
    createViewOrdersButtonActionListener(JButton viewBtn)
    Method that created an action listener for the button that displays all the products of the database

  • Method Details

    • createAddButtonActionListener

      public void createAddButtonActionListener(JButton addOrderBtn)
      Method that creates the action listener of the button that creates a new order This method calls a method of productBLL that checks whether the order can be placed (if the amount of products that the client wants order are in stock) If the order can be placed, a new order is created and the stock of products is updated, otherwise a warning understock messages is displayed
      Parameters:
      addOrderBtn -

    • createViewOrdersButtonActionListener

      Method that created an action listener for the button that displays all the products of the database

      Method that configures the columns and rows of the JTable in which the orders will be displayed
      Parameters:
      ordersTable - the table in which the orders will be displayed
      tableModel - the table model the table is constructed after
